FrageText.de: In welche Richtung dürfen Sie fahren, nachdem die Ampel auf "Grün" umgeschaltet hat?
FrageText.en: In what direction are you permitted to drive after the traffic light has turned green?
FrageText.hr: Kojim smjerom smijete voziti nakon što semafor prebaci na "zeleno"?
FrageText.sl: V katere smeri lahko zapeljete, ko se na semaforju prižge zelena luč?
FrageText.tr: Lamba ”yeşil”e geçtikten sonra, hangi istikamete gidebilirsiniz?

en.Text: To the right and straight ahead
To the left and straight ahead
